mapper.sql: id, merch_no, name, phonename, phone, bslicense, aptitude, attestation, issms, tipsType, serviclinkuser, linkphone, linkemail, private_key, addadminid, editadminid, isshow, created, cloudmoney, cloudcode, cloudpaypwd, updated, certificate
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pay_cloud_company
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.*,b.agent_rate FROM pay_cloud_company a INNER JOIN pay_cloud_company_agent b ON a.merch_no=b.agent_no
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.*,b.sales_rate FROM pay_cloud_company a INNER JOIN pay_cloud_company_sales b ON a.merch_no=b.sales_no
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pay_cloud_company (id, merch_no, name, phonename, phone, bslicense, aptitude, attestation, issms, tipsType, serviclinkuser, linkphone, linkemail, private_key, addadminid, editadminid, isshow, created, cloudmoney, cloudcode, cloudpaypwd, updated, certificate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aptitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attestation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{issms,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tipstype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{serviclinkuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addadminid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editadminid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isshow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cloudmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cloudcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloudpaypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
